main event: A ground-radar observation of a white oval object near Ouagadougou, Upper Volta, Africa on October 5, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 4-5 minutes and involved only one object,The course of the object was northerly,The observation was conducted as per a request by field workers,The report includes a telegram from the Department of State regarding material found nearby,The shape and configuration of the observed object indicated it may have disintegrated due to heat.
